body.name: MOUNT PRO Monitor Wall Mount for Max 35 Inch Ultrawide Computer Screen, Premium Heavy Duty Single Monitor Arm, Full Motion Wall Monitor Mount with VESA Extension Kit, Max VESA 200x200mm
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 21 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 15 mins
features: Fits UltraWide Screen - Our premium computer monitor wall mount widely fits17 22 23 24 27 30 32 34 35inch monitors or TV weighing from 6.6 lbs to 19.8lbs. What's more, our single monitor wall mount includes a VESA extension kit that expands the VESA plate size to a maximum of 200 x 200mm and can support a VESA size of 75 x 75/100 x 100/100 x 200/200 x 200mm. Compared to other similar monitor wall mounts, our ultrawide monitor mount covers almost all VESA sizes, giving you greater compatibility.

Freed Desk Work Space - Our wall mount monitor arm lets you mount your display on the wall without taking up your valuable desk space. The monitor wall arm can be folded against the wall or extended forward(extends up to 21.29 inches and retracts back to 3.53 inches), providing an optimal viewing experience while saving space. Moreover, our wall mount for monitor also provides cable management, you will don’t worry about the messy wires.

Full Motion Adjustable - Our monitor arm wall mount offers a variety of angles to adjust your monitor. It can tilt-90°/ +90° to reduce screen glaring and rotates 360° to switch portrait or landscape orientations. The swivel 180° adjustment function on horizontal orientation allows you to watch the screen from different seat positions. You'll have the flexibility to adjust your viewing angle as you like.

Back and Neck Saver - Our pc monitor wall mount built-in premium gas spring after over 20,000 exercise tests, provides longer life and makes the arm move around easier and smoother. Furthermore, the monitor can be raised to eye level to improve posture and relieve neck and shoulder fatigue while increasing work efficiency and comfort.

Stability & Easy Installation - Our Vesa monitor wall mount bracket is mounted on the wall, and is more stable and secure than desktop monitor mounts without damaging your expensive desk. It also has a wider range of applications, you can mount it in your bedroom, living room, kitchen, or anywhere there is a wall according to your needs. The installation only needs 10 minutes or less! (Note: Do not mount to drywall alone)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are your shoulders, neck, or eyes aching from staring at a computer screen all day? Do you feel cluttered and cramped where you work? It's time to change the way you work and live! The ergonomic solution is the MOUNT PRO Ultrawide Gas Spring Wall Mount!

Discover Your Most Productive Self By providing a flexible and adjustable solution, optimizes your viewing angle, reduces neck, back, and eye strain, and ultimately improves your overall productivity and well-being.
Previous page Next page The Application of This Single Monitor Wall Mount 1 Gym 2 Meeting Room 3 Living Room 4 Laboratory

Optimize Space Mounting your monitor on an arm frees up valuable desk space, creating a cleaner and more organized workspace. It also allows you to easily switch between tasks or collaborate with colleagues, creating a more flexible and dynamic work environment.

Previous page This ergonomic support helps reduce discomfort and fatigue during long hours. Comfortable height for both sitting and standing You can watch the monitor from different seating positions Next page Multi-functional Single Monitor Wall Mount 1 Ergonomic Support 2 Healthy Workstation 3 Extra Flexibility

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Follow the instructions
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install. I just followed the instructions. The hardest part was finding a stud with the stud finder. I should give that a poor review. This is super sturdy and given the right tools, which I have, it installed in less than 20 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount easier to stow than flip style
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for the Echo Show 15 after realizing that the flip mount we originally ordered would simply not work. The flip mount would not stow all the way and made the counter unusable when the Echo was stowed. This mount is the ANSWER! It was super easy to install, I used heavy duty wall anchors and nails (from a big box store) instead of using a stud and it works great. To ensure it would stow correctly, rotate, and not hit the upper cabinets I attached the back to the mount first and then marked where the mount would go. I could not be happier with the mount, and it allows me to use my Echo as intended. I would not recommend the flip style mounts at all due to the size of the Echo itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install but the anchors did not work do I bought new ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. Very sturdy and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not swivel, cannot contact customer service
reviews.reviewText: It looks sturdy enough, but out of the box was extremely difficult to swivel at all three swivel points. The two swivel points closest to the wall were easy enough to loosen slightly using a wrench. However the third swivel point (the one furthest from the wall mount) did not seem to have anyway to adjust. If I could loosen it just a tad, this thing would probably ok fine. But I can't so I don't want to mount it.Additionally, there appears to be NO WAY to get any customer support. Possibly there is a way to adjust the third swivel point, but there is NO WAY to get any help. Worthless. Hopefully, I can get a refund. Amazon is pretty good about that, I just wish Amazon would screen the companies--if no customer support, then they shouldn't be allowed to sell their products on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Muy producto, le tengo colocado un Monitor MSI de 34" panorámico, y lo soporta super bien. Me parece una fantástica inversion. Super recomendado.
